ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 23
Message-ID: <17248.23.83.959279670@...>
Date: Sun, 14 Mar 1999 18:36:04 -0500
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Re: (no subject)

>when is gladiator beyond freedom coming out.

Our standard delay-answer right now, I'm afraid, goes something like:
Sorry about the delay in G:BF -- unfortunately, we don't currently have
funding, and so two of our group have joined up with Blizzard and are
working on Diablo 2. We're happy for them (D2 should be a GREAT game), but
it's meant that progress on G:BF has slowed immensely :(

>what is arena gladiator fighting.

Ala the Romans, or (in current days) kind of like WWF wrestling .. people
dress up funny and perform various stunts in competition with each other.
Unrelated to the Gladiator game.

>how do you edit graphics.

You can use the program "editor.exe" in the Gladiator directory.  However,
we don't specifically support its use (too old and complicated), so you'll
have to hope someone on the list can give you a few pointers if you have
trouble with it.

>is the levels webpage up yet 

I don't think so.

--Tom
